meanings.sent1: The picture on the wall was untilted and perfectly straight.
meanings.sent2: The untilted table stood firmly on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The untilted bookshelf made the room look neat and organized.
meanings.sent4: Her untilted posture showed confidence and poise.
meanings.sent5: The untilted horizon stretched endlessly before us.

meanings.definition: To make something straight or level.
meanings.sent1: He carefully untilted the painting on the wall until it hung perfectly.
meanings.sent2: She untilted the crooked picture frame on the desk.
meanings.sent3: The carpenter untilted the wooden beam with precision.
meanings.sent4: The gardener untilted the flower bed, creating a neat row of blooms.
meanings.sent5: They untilted the table by adjusting the legs until it was level.
